clientId.description: ID of the client for whom the schedule is.

caregiverId.description: ID of the caregiver assigned to the schedule (can be tentative).

date.description: Date of the schedule in YYYY-MM-DD format.

startTime.description: Start time of the schedule in HH:MM (24-hour) format.

endTime.description: End time of the schedule in HH:MM (24-hour) format.

tasks.description: List of tasks to be performed during the schedule.

notes.description: Any specific notes for this schedule entry.
